snippet: Mayor Tom Barrett of Milwaukee said Friday that he was standing behind Police Chief Edward Flynn after officers took a vote expressing a lack of confidence in their chief.
abstract: Milwaukee Mayor Tom Barrett says he is standing behind Police Chief Edward Flynn; police officers angered by the firing of Officer Christopher Manney, who shot and killed vagrant Dontre Hamilton in a park, took a vote expressing lack of confidence in their chief.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Tom Barrett of Milwaukee said Friday that he was standing behind Police Chief Edward Flynn after officers took a vote expressing a lack of confidence in their chief.

headline.main: Wisconsin: Officers Vote Against Milwaukee Chief
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Officers Vote Against Milwaukee Chief
